ItemTooltip.LogicGate_NOR:
Judges logic gate lamps above it
Activates when no lamp is on, deactivates otherwise
ItemTooltip.LogicGate_NXOR:
Judges logic gate lamps above it
Activates when the total 'on' lamps is not one, deactivates otherwise
Also often called NXOR
ItemTooltip.LogicGate_OR:
Judges logic gate lamps above it
Activates when any lamp is on, deactivates otherwise
ItemTooltip.LogicGate_XOR:
Judges logic gate lamps above it
Activates when only one lamp is on, deactivates otherwise
ItemTooltip.LogicSensor_Above: Activates whenever players are over it, deactivates otherwise
ItemTooltip.LogicSensor_Honey: Activates whenever occupied by honey, deactivates otherwise
ItemTooltip.LogicSensor_Lava: Activates whenever occupied by lava, deactivates otherwise
ItemTooltip.LogicSensor_Liquid: Activates whenever occupied by liquid, deactivates otherwise
ItemTooltip.LogicSensor_Water: Activates whenever occupied by water, deactivates otherwise
